inherited_effect_description_eng: [Your Turn] While this Digimon has 4 or more digivolution cards, it gets +1000 DP.
[Your Turn] <Security Attack +1> (This Digimon checks 1 additional security card).
[Your Turn] When this Digimon is blocked, gain 3 memory.

effect_description_eng: [Your Turn] For every 2 digivolution cards, this Digimon gains <Security Attack +1>.
[Your Turn] All of your Red Digimon gain +1000 DP.
[Main] 1 of your Digimon gets +3000 DP for the turn.
security_effect_description_eng: [Security] Add this card to your hand.

card_name_jpn: スターライト・エクスプロージョン
effect_description_eng: [Main] All of your Security Digimon get +7000 DP until the end of your opponent's next turn.
security_effect_description_eng: [Security] Add this card to your hand.

effect_description_eng: [Main] Delete up to 2 of your opponent's Digimon with 4000 DP or less.

<Fortitude> (When this Digimon with digivolution cards is deleted, play this card without paying the cost.)
[All Turns] When Tamer cards are placed in this Digimon's digivolution cards, 1 of your opponent's Digimon can't activate [When Digivolving] effects until the end of their turn.
inherited_effect_description_eng: [All Turns] [Once Per Turn] When this Digimon deletes your opponent's Digimon in battle, trash their top security card.

effect_description_eng:
<Fortitude> (When this Digimon with digivolution cards is deleted, play this card without paying the cost.)
[When Digivolving] Suspend 1 of your opponent's Digimon or Tamers. Then, 1 of their Digimon or Tamers can't unsuspend until the end of their turn.
[All Turns] When Tamer cards are placed in this Digimon's digivolution cards, activate 1 of this Digimon's [When Digivolving] effects. Then, 1 of your Digimon may attack your opponent's Digimon.
inherited_effect_description_eng: [All Turns] [Once Per Turn] When your security stack is removed from, if this Digimon has [Fenriloogamon] in its name, <Recovery +1 (Deck)> (Place the top card of your deck on top of your security stack.)

effect_description_eng:
When this card would be played, if you have a Digimon with the [ACCEL] trait, reduce the play cost by 5.
[On Play] [When Digivolving] <De-Digivolve 2> 1 of your opponent's Digimon. Then, 1 of their Digimon gets -5000 DP until the end of their turn.
[End of Your Turn] This Digimon and any of your other Digimon may DNA digivolve into a Digimon card with [Chaosmon] in its name in the hand. Then, the DNA digivolved Digimon may attack.
inherited_effect_description_eng: [Opponent's Turn] [Once Per Turn] When one of your opponent's Digimon attacks, you may change the attack target to this Digimon.

card_name_jpn: カオスモン：ヴァロドゥルアーム
effect_description_eng:
<Security A. +1> (This Digimon checks 1 additional security card.)
<Partition (Yellow Lv.6 & Green/Black Lv.6)> (When this Digimon with each of the specified digivolution cards would leave the battle area other than by your own effects or by battle, you may play 1 each of the specified cards without paying the costs.)
[When Digivolving] For each of this Digimon's level 6 digivolution cards, suspend 1 of your opponent's Digimon or Tamers and gain 1 memory. Then none of their Digimon or Tamers can activate [On Play] effects or unsuspend until the end of their turn.
[Your Turn] When this Digimon would digivolve into a Digimon card with the [ACCEL] trait, reduce the digivolution cost by 1.
inherited_effect_description_eng: <Piercing> (When this Digimon attacks and deletes an opponent's Digimon in battle, it checks security before the attack ends.)

effect_description_eng: [On Play] [When Digivolving] Suspend 1 of your opponent's Digimon.
inherited_effect_description_eng: <Piercing> (When this Digimon attacks and deletes an opponent's Digimon in battle, it checks security before the attack ends.)

effect_description_eng:
<Raid> (When this Digimon attacks, you may switch the target of attack to 1 of your opponent's unsuspended Digimon with the highest DP.)
[Your Turn] When any of your blue Digimon with [Dracomon] or [Examon] in their texts are played, this Digimon may digivolve into [Groundramon] in the hand with the digivolution cost reduced by 2.
[On Play] [When Digivolving] Suspend 1 of your opponent's Digimon and 1 of your Digimon gets +3000 DP for the turn. Then, 1 of your Digimon may attack.
inherited_effect_description_eng: [When Attacking] [Once Per Turn] 1 of your opponent's Digimon gets -4000 DP for the turn.

effect_description_eng:
[On Play] [When Digivolving] Suspend 1 of your opponent's Digimon or Tamers. Then, 1 of their Digimon or Tamers can't unsuspend until the end of their turn.
[All Turns] This Digimon is also treated as Lv.6 [Breakdramon] for [Examon]'s DNA digivolution.
inherited_effect_description_eng: [All Turns] [Once Per Turn] When this Digimon deletes your opponent's Digimon in battle, trash their top security card.
